protocol.text: GeneChip intensities were background-corrected, normalized and sumarized by RMA method, using the “Affy” package from Bioconductor. ID_REF =  VALUE = Log2 RMA signal
No further treatment was applied to the samples before harvesting.
Plants were grown for 18 days in solid MS medium and in SD conditions.
The RNA from complete plants was isolated using EZNA Plant RNA kit from OMEGA bio-tek. RNA was quantified and the RNA quality was assessed with a 2100 Bioanalyzer from Agilent Technologies
Biotinylated cRNA was prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 500 ng total RNA (GeneChip 3' IVT Express Kit).

Following fragmentation, 10 �g of biotinylated cRNA were hybridized to Affymetrix chips (GENECHIP MODEL). Each sample was added to a hybridization solution containing 100mM 2-(N-morpholino)ethanesulfonic acid, 1 M Na+, and 20mM of EDTA in the presence of 0.01% of Tween-20 to a final cRNA concentration of 0.05 �g/ml. Hybridization was performed for 16 h at 45�C . Each microarray was washed and stained with streptavidin-phycoerythrin in a Fluidics station 450 (Affymetrix).
GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G
